prism

Class ExplicitModel2MTBDD

  • java.lang.Object
    • prism.ExplicitModel2MTBDD

  • public class ExplicitModel2MTBDD
extends java.lang.Object
    Class to convert explicit-state representation of a model to a symbolic one.

    • Method Detail

      • buildModel

        public Model buildModel(Model modelExpl,
                        java.util.List<State> statesList,
                        ModulesFile modulesFile,
                        boolean doReach)
                 throws PrismException
        Construct a symbolic model from an explicit state one. If provided, statesList is used to encode states using model variables, in which case a corresponding ModulesFile must be provided for variable details (and e.g. module names). If both are null, a single variable x is assumed.
        Throws:
        PrismException

      • allocateDDVars

        private void allocateDDVars()

      • sortDDVars

        private void buildTrans(Model modelExpl)
                 throws PrismException

        Throws:

      • encodeStatePair

        private JDDNode encodeStatePair(int r,
                                int c)
        Encode a state index pair into BDD vars (referencing the result).
        Parameters:
        r - State row index
        c - State column index
